text:
[Verse]
Butterfly wings take flight
Dancing in the pale moonlight
Colors blend a beautiful sight
In the air they find delight

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the silent breeze
Magic moves with such ease
Flutter here to the trees
Freedom lives where they please

[Chorus]
Fly high in the sky
Touch the clouds passing by
Wonder why oh wonder why
Butterflies never say goodbye

[Verse 3]
Morning sun and skies so blue
Every day something new
Life's a pattern they pursue
In the air they renew

[Bridge]
Soft and light they roam
Never holding a home
Wings glimmer on their own
Free spirits never alone

[Chorus]
Fly high in the sky
Touch the clouds passing by
Wonder why oh wonder why
Butterflies never say goodbye
title: Butterfly Wings
